```python
from gensim import corpora, models
import jieba.posseg as jp
import jieba
 
# 
def get_text(text):
    flags = ('n', 'nr', 'ns', 'nt', 'eng', 'v', 'd')  # 
    stopwords = ('', '', '', '', '', '', '', '')  # 
    words_list = []
    for text in texts:
        words = [w.word for w in jp.cut(text) if w.flag in flags and w.word not in stopwords]
        words_list.append(words)
    return words_list
 
 
# LDA
def LDA_model(words_list):
    # 
    # Dictionary()ID
    dictionary = corpora.Dictionary(words_list)
    print(dictionary)
    print('id:')
    print(dictionary.token2id)  # id
 
    # dictionary
    # doc2bow()dictionarycorpus
    # , ID
    corpus = [dictionary.doc2bow(words) for words in words_list]
    print(':')
    print(corpus)  # 
 
    # LDA
    # num_topics -- 
    # id2word    -- LdaModeldictionaryid
    # passes     -- 
    lda_model = models.ldamodel.LdaModel(corpus=corpus, num_topics=2, id2word=dictionary, passes=10)
 
    return lda_model
 
 
if __name__ == "__main__":
    texts = ['OPPO K3', \
             'OPPO K3K3', \
             'OPPO K3', \
             'PRO73GKUI19', \
             'CS75 PLUS', \
             '']
    # 
    words_list = get_text(texts)
    print('')
    print(words_list)
 
    # LDA
    lda_model = LDA_model(words_list)
 
    #  print_topic  print_topics 
    # 5
    topic_words = lda_model.print_topics(num_topics=2, num_words=5)
    print('5:')
    print(topic_words)
 
    # 
    words_list = lda_model.show_topic(0, 5)
    print(':')
    print(words_list)
```

## 
1. Mutual InformationMI
transinformation $p(X,Y)$  $p(X)p(Y)$ mutual dependence


2. 
 $p(X,Y)$ XYp(X)p(Y)XY
$$
I(X; Y) = \sum_{y\in Y}\sum_{x\in X}p(x, y) \log(\frac{p(x,y)}{p(x)p(y)})
$$

$$
\begin{aligned}
I(X; Y) &= \sum_{x,y}p(x, y) \log{\frac{p(x, y)}{p(x)p(y)}}\\\\
&= \sum_{x,y}p(x, y) \log{\frac{p(x, y)}{p(x)}} - \sum_{x,y}p(x, y) \log p(y)\\\\
&= \sum_{x,y}p(x)p(y|x) \log(py|x) - \sum_{x,y}p(x, y) \log{p(y)}\\\\
&= \sum_xp(x)(\sum_yp(y|x) \log{p(y|x)}) - \sum_y \log{p(y)}(\sum_xp(x,y))\\\\
&= -\sum_xp(x)H(Y|X=x) - \sum_y \log{p(y)p(y)}\\\\
&= -H(Y|X) + H(Y)\\\\
&= H(Y) - H(Y|X)
\end{aligned}
$$

print(features_score_list)

1. Mutual InformationMI

2. 
 $p(X,Y)$ XYp(X)p(Y)XY
$$
I(X; Y) = \sum_{y\in Y}\sum_{x\in X}p(x, y) \log(\frac{p(x,y)}{p(x)p(y)})
$$

$$
\begin{aligned}
I(X; Y) &= \sum_{x,y}p(x, y) \log{\frac{p(x, y)}{p(x)p(y)}}\\\\
&= \sum_{x,y}p(x, y) \log{\frac{p(x, y)}{p(x)}} - \sum_{x,y}p(x, y) \log p(y)\\\\
&= \sum_{x,y}p(x)p(y|x) \log(py|x) - \sum_{x,y}p(x, y) \log{p(y)}\\\\
&= \sum_xp(x)(\sum_yp(y|x) \log{p(y|x)}) - \sum_y \log{p(y)}(\sum_xp(x,y))\\\\
&= -\sum_xp(x)H(Y|X=x) - \sum_y \log{p(y)p(y)}\\\\
&= -H(Y|X) + H(Y)\\\\
&= H(Y) - H(Y|X)
\end{aligned}
$$

from gensim import corpora, models
import jieba.posseg as jp
import jieba

# 
def get_text(text):
    flags = ('n', 'nr', 'ns', 'nt', 'eng', 'v', 'd')  # 
    stopwords = ('', '', '', '', '', '', '', '')  # 
    words_list = []
    for text in texts:
        words = [w.word for w in jp.cut(text) if w.flag in flags and w.word not in stopwords]
        words_list.append(words)
    return words_list


# LDA
def LDA_model(words_list):
    # 
    # Dictionary()ID
    dictionary = corpora.Dictionary(words_list)
    print(dictionary)
    print('id:')
    print(dictionary.token2id)  # id

    # dictionary
    # doc2bow()dictionarycorpus
    # , ID
    corpus = [dictionary.doc2bow(words) for words in words_list]
    print(':')
    print(corpus)  # 

    # LDA
    # num_topics -- 
    # id2word    -- LdaModeldictionaryid
    # passes     -- 
    lda_model = models.ldamodel.LdaModel(corpus=corpus, num_topics=2, id2word=dictionary, passes=10)

    return lda_model


if __name__ == "__main__":
    texts = ['OPPO K3', \
             'OPPO K3K3', \
             'OPPO K3', \
             'PRO73GKUI19', \
             'CS75 PLUS', \
             '']
    # 
    words_list = get_text(texts)
    print('')
    print(words_list)

    # LDA
    lda_model = LDA_model(words_list)

    #  print_topic  print_topics 
    # 5
    topic_words = lda_model.print_topics(num_topics=2, num_words=5)
    print('5:')
    print(topic_words)

    # 
    words_list = lda_model.show_topic(0, 5)
    print(':')
    print(words_list)

## jdk

## jdk
macos
1. echo $SHELL shell
2. bash:echo "export JAVA_HOME=<java_install_path>" >> ~/.bash_profile
        source ~/.bash_profile
3. zsh: echo "export JAVA_HOME=<java_install_path>" >> ~/.zprofile
        source ~/.zprofile

4. DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH
   bash:echo "export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH=$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH:<java_install_path>/bin" >> ~/.profile
        source ~/.profile
   zsh :echo "export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH=$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH:<java_install_path>/bin" >> ~/.zshrc
        source ~/.zshrc
[]https://ww2.mathworks.cn/help/compiler_sdk/java/configure-your-java-environment.html?searchHighlight=java&s_tid=srchtitle_java_7

## MacOSSIP
1. 
2. command+R recovery mode
3. recovery mode terminal
4. command line: csrutil disable SIP

## matlab
macos
export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH="${DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH:+${DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH}:}\
<MATLAB_RUNTIME_INSTALL_DIR>/runtime/maci64:\
<MATLAB_RUNTIME_INSTALL_DIR>/bin/maci64:\
<MATLAB_RUNTIME_INSTALL_DIR>/sys/os/maci64:\
<MATLAB_RUNTIME_INSTALL_DIR>/extern/bin/maci64"
[]https://ww2.mathworks.cn/help/compiler/mcr-path-settings-for-run-time-deployment.html
